record.title: RECOGNITION OF THE MAJORITY LEADER
record.narrative:
RECOGNITION OF THE MAJORITY LEADER -- (Senate - December 17, 2007)

[Page: S15710]

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
